trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Interagisce con il parser per compilare il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds literal content to the control.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge contenuto in formato letterale per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The AppendLiteralString method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AppendLiteralString%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class so that the method of the base class has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo metodo AppendLiteralString il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder>classe sostituzioni il <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AppendLiteralString%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>classe in modo che il metodo della classe di base non ha alcun effetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AppendLiteralString%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The literal content to add to the control.
trans-unit.target: Il valore letterale contenuto da aggiungere al controllo.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <xref:System.Type> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control's specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Type>per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> controllo figlio specificato del controllo.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The GetChildControlType method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetChildControlType della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder>classe esegue l'override del <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the GetChildControlType method always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione del metodo GetChildControlType restituisce sempre `null`.

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the child control.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del tag del controllo figlio.

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes contained in the child control.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di attributi contenuti nel controllo figlio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType*> method is overridden to always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType*>override del metodo restituiscono sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control needs to get its inner text.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> controllo deve ottenere il testo interno.

trans-unit.source: The NeedsTagInnerText method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class to always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo NeedsTagInnerText il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder>classe sostituzioni il <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>classe per restituire sempre `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The inner text is the text between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il testo interno è il testo tra i tag di apertura e chiusura del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText*> method is overridden to always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText*>override del metodo restituiscono sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control's inner text.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> testo interno del controllo.

trans-unit.source: This method loads the <xref:System.String> passed in to an XML document to determine whether it is well-formed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo carica il <xref:System.String>passato a un documento XML per determinare se è corretto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If it is, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo caso, il codice chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value to insert as the inner text.
trans-unit.target: Il valore da inserire come testo interno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> object passed in is not well-formed XML.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.String>oggetto passato non è ben formato XML.</xref:System.String>
